resumen: This is a summary of my skills and experience developed with Angular.
presentacion: I have crafted this resume with the aim of securing an opportunity to grow and develop as a data analyst. I am thrilled about the prospect of being considered for this position.
empleos: Here you will find the different jobs I've had over time, in addition to explaining the activities I developed, the strengths I gained from them, and finally, the circumstances that led to the end of each working relationship.
edutext: Here you will see the different institutions I have attended throughout my school life.
cursos2: In this GitHub repository, you will find the diplomas and certificates of the courses i have completed.
tep1: Here are most of the personal projects I have worked on. Clicking on the image will take you to the repository where they are hosted and their description.
text: I am Marco Rubio, 26 years old, living in Culiacán, Sinaloa. I enjoy programming and stock market finance.
text1: One of my hobbies is spending time with my family, or as in the case of the picture, with my godson. Although he always cries when I hold him.
text2: Something I have always enjoyed is sports, especially football, or lately, going to the gym before starting the day to stay energized.
text3: Another one of my hobbies, like every programmer, is spending my free time playing games with my friends, such as Smash, LOL, among other games.
text4: In terms of work, I have always had an interest in both fields, seeking a middle ground between them, which I could say I found with data analysis.
conta1: Here you will find my details, and you can also use the form to send me a message.
descarga_texto: Download my updated CV in PDF format to review it at your convenience or share it with others.
menu_subtitulo: Select a section to learn more about my experience, skills, projects, and education.
text_quien: I am a data scientist and financier, focused on using artificial intelligence to solve complex problems and add value to organizations. I am passionate about data analysis, statistics, and programming. I have experience in data analysis projects, visualization, and predictive modeling, using tools such as Python, R, and SQL and working on incorporating new AI tools to optimize processes like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
text_obj: To use AI and data analysis to solve problems focused on the financial area, optimizing processes that allow for better decision-making, with a focus on risk control and profit maximization.
text_logros: Development of an intranet to automate financial and reporting processes, integrating multiple information sources and improving data traceability.
